```{r chunky001}
  
library(dplyr)
library(ggeasy)
```

```{r chunky004}

iris1 <- iris%>%
  label(vars=names(iris)[-1],labels = c('Sepal Width','Petal Length','Petal Width','Flower Species'))

```

```{r chunky005}

iris1%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width))+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Species))


```

```{r chunky006}

iris1%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width))+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Species)) +
  easy_labs()

```

```{r chunky007}

iris1%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Sepal.Width))+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Species)) +
  easy_labs(title='my title',subtitle='mysubtitle',x='aaa')

```
